title: Leadership Education Based on the IMMARA Learning Model for Enhancing Digital Literacy and Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool experience and intermediate-level scientific and technological knowledge
context.additional_context: Participants, as corporate managers/leaders, require strengthened decision-making and team management capabilities in digital transformation contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can determine the credibility of science-related content with over 85% accuracy using digital information evaluation tools
Learners can design creative problem-solving projects applying the IMMARA model and incorporate peer feedback three or more times
Learners can complete science-based team assignments using digital collaboration platforms (e.g., Miro, Notion) while applying creative thinking at four or higher levels

resources: Data Visualization Software for Scientific Fields

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
